Song.title: Glory Awaits
Song.copyright: Â© 2013 Sovereign Grace Praise Music by Jon Underhill, Words by Jon Underhill & Bob Kauflin

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Blood-bought [Am]children who are suff'ring It won't be [C]long, it won't be long Storm-tossed [Am]pilgrim, if you're struggling It won't be [C]long, it won't be long
Verse 2: Though your [Am]flesh is now decaying It won't be [C]long, it won't be long A new [Am]body God is making It won't be [C]long, it won't be long
Chorus: [Dm]Glory a[F]waits for [C]all God's red[G]eemed [Dm]Glory a[F]waits and we'll be [Am]free [(2x instrumental)]
Verse 3: All you [Am]saints now bound in prison It won't be [C]long, it won't be long Here's your [Am]freedom: Christ is risen It won't be [C]long, it won't be long
Inst.: [Am | | C | | Am | | C | | Dm C/E | F G | Am]
Verse 4: We are [Am]longing for Christ's appearing It won't be [C]long, it won't be long Tears will [Am]vanish when we see Him It won't be [C]long, it won't be long
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 bloodbought children who are suffring it wont be long it wont be long stormtossed pilgrim if youre struggling it wont be long it wont be long verse 2 though your flesh is now decaying it wont be long it wont be long a new body god is making it wont be long it wont be long chorus glory awaits for all gods redeemed glory awaits and well be free verse 3 all you saints now bound in prison it wont be long it wont be long heres your freedom christ is risen it wont be long it wont be long inst verse 4 we are longing for christs appearing it wont be long it wont be long tears will vanish when we see him it wont be long it wont be long
